BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-Std_Commands
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: General purpose commands always available in ChimeraX

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Selector :: sel :: selected atoms
ChimeraX :: Selector :: all :: everything
ChimeraX :: Selector :: pbonds :: pseudobonds
ChimeraX :: Selector :: hbonds :: hydrogen bonds
ChimeraX :: Selector :: hbondatoms :: hydrogen bond atoms
ChimeraX :: Command :: alias :: General Controls :: create shorthand version of command
ChimeraX :: Command :: alias list :: General Controls :: list command aliases
ChimeraX :: Command :: alias delete :: General Controls :: remove command alias
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~alias :: General Controls :: remove command alias
ChimeraX :: Command :: align :: Structure Comparison :: superimpose specific parts of structures
ChimeraX :: Command :: camera :: Viewing Controls :: change "camera" parametrs of main viewing window
ChimeraX :: Command :: cartoon :: Depiction :: show stylized representation of structure
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~cartoon :: Depiction :: stop show stylized representation of structure
ChimeraX :: Command :: cd :: General Controls :: change ChimeraX's current working directory
ChimeraX :: Command :: clip :: Viewing Controls :: control clipping of models
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~clip :: Viewing Controls :: stop clipping of models
ChimeraX :: Command :: close :: General Controls :: close models
ChimeraX :: Command :: cofr :: General Controls :: set center of rotation
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~cofr :: General Controls :: revert to default center of rotation
ChimeraX :: Command :: color :: Depiction :: change model colors
ChimeraX :: Command :: colour :: Depiction :: change model colors
ChimeraX :: Command :: color delete :: General Controls :: delete custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: color list :: General Controls :: list custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: color name :: General Controls :: define custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: color show :: General Controls :: show definition of custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: colordef :: General Controls :: define custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~colordef :: General Controls :: remove custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: colourdef :: General Controls :: define custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~colourdef :: General Controls :: remove custom color names
ChimeraX :: Command :: coordset :: General Controls :: show specific coordinate set (a.k.a. frame or conformer)
ChimeraX :: Command :: crossfade :: Movie Making :: fade from one view to another
ChimeraX :: Command :: delete :: Structure Editing :: delete parts of a structure
ChimeraX :: Command :: dssp :: Structure Editing :: compute/assign secondary structure
ChimeraX :: Command :: exit :: General Controls :: quit ChimeraX
ChimeraX :: Command :: quit :: General Controls :: quit ChimeraX
ChimeraX :: Command :: graphics :: General Controls :: control 3D graphics parameters
ChimeraX :: Command :: hide :: Viewing Controls :: stop displaying (parts of) a model
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~show :: Viewing Controls :: stop displaying (parts of) a model
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~display :: Viewing Controls :: stop displaying (parts of) a model
ChimeraX :: Command :: lighting :: Viewing Controls :: change lighting
ChimeraX :: Command :: material :: Depiction :: change visual surface properties of 3D objects
ChimeraX :: Command :: measure buriedarea :: Surface/Binding Analysis :: measure surface area buried by contacting structures
ChimeraX :: Command :: measure convexity :: Surface/Binding Analysis :: color surface based on local convexity
ChimeraX :: Command :: measure length :: Volume :: measure path length of connected markers
ChimeraX :: Command :: move :: General Controls :: move (parts of) a model relative to others
ChimeraX :: Command :: palette :: General Controls :: list available color palettes
ChimeraX :: Command :: pdbimages :: Input/Output :: batch processing of mmCIF files into images
ChimeraX :: Command :: perframe :: General Controls :: execute commands every frame
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~perframe :: General Controls :: stop execution of commands every frame
ChimeraX :: Command :: pwd :: Utilities :: report current working directory
ChimeraX :: Command :: rainbow :: Depiction :: "rainbow" color (parts of) structures
ChimeraX :: Command :: rename :: General Controls :: change name or ID of model
ChimeraX :: Command :: roll :: General Controls :: continuously turn model(s) about an axis
ChimeraX :: Command :: run :: Utilities :: execute arguments as a command
ChimeraX :: Command :: runscript :: General Controls :: run a Python script with arguments
ChimeraX :: Command :: select :: General Controls :: select models or parts thereof
ChimeraX :: Command :: ~select :: General Controls :: unselect models or parts thereof
ChimeraX :: Command :: set :: General Controls :: set various global parameters
ChimeraX :: Command :: setattr :: General Controls :: set Python attribute values for structure elements
ChimeraX :: Command :: show :: Viewing Controls :: display (parts of) a model
ChimeraX :: Command :: display :: Viewing Controls :: display (parts of) a model
ChimeraX :: Command :: size :: Depiction :: change display size of structural elements
ChimeraX :: Command :: split :: General Controls :: split a model into multiple models
ChimeraX :: Command :: stop :: General Controls :: stop an ongoing motion
ChimeraX :: Command :: style :: Depiction :: change style of depiction for strcutural elements
ChimeraX :: Command :: sym :: Higher-Order Structure :: generate symmetry mates
ChimeraX :: Command :: time :: Utilities :: time execution and redisplay of commands
ChimeraX :: Command :: transparency :: Depiction :: change transparency of (parts of) models
ChimeraX :: Command :: turn :: General Controls :: rotate a model about an axis
ChimeraX :: Command :: undo :: General Controls :: undo a command
ChimeraX :: Command :: redo :: General Controls :: redo an undone command
ChimeraX :: Command :: usage :: Utilities :: show the required syntax for a command
ChimeraX :: Command :: version :: Utilities :: report ChimeraX version number
ChimeraX :: Command :: view :: Viewing Controls :: change/save/restore 3D view
ChimeraX :: Command :: wait :: Movie Making :: wait a given amount of frames before executing the next command
ChimeraX :: Command :: windowsize :: General Controls :: set the size of the 3D window
ChimeraX :: Command :: select zone :: General Controls :: select (parts of) models within a 3D zone
ChimeraX :: Command :: zoom :: Viewing Controls :: zoom in/out
